subject: Order #SSN4251 - Stuck for more than a month
description_text:
Hello,

My order has been stuck in Liege, Belgium for more than a month now and I'm
growing really impatient. I opened a support ticket earlier which hasn't
received any answer in weeks.

I will soon have to file a claim with my bank.

Thank you,
Victor

conversations.body_text: Hi Victor Leroux,     We apologize for the delay. We will immediately look into your request and arrange for a replacement.
